meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 4 = 0.4 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial, '5' mark at bottom of dial. Dial number scale position: pointing between 1 and 2, approximately at 1.4. Clock position: between 1 and 2 o'clock. Degrees: 50° (pointing UP-RIGHT between 12 and 3 o'clock). Verification: Hand is pointing UP-RIGHT ✓. Dial reading: 50/3600 = 0.014 m³. Total: 2271.414 m³. Image is slightly blurry but all digits are discernible. The red sweep hand on the dial appears to be pointing approximately 50 degrees from vertical (between the 1 and 2 position on the dial face).
